summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1839, for the improvement of West Fifty-sixth Street and West Fifty-seventh Street, each from Ninth Avenue Northwest to Eleventh Avenue Northwest, and West Fifty-eighth Street, from Eighth Avenue Northwest to Eleventh Avenue Northwest, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all manholes, flush tanks, catch basins and other appurtenances necessary for the proper sewering and draining of said district, under Ordinance No. 19031, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
